hero.title: 2sec
hero.subtitle: Capture your day in "2 seconds".
hero.caption: The Simplest Life-Log Camera

concept.title: Do you actually watch<br class="hidden md:block" />those long travel videos?
concept.p1:
Videos left sleeping in your camera roll.
The hassle of pressing the stop button.
concept.p2:
2sec is a camera app born from these frustrations,
capturing "just 2 seconds".

split.title: Intuitive "Split View"
split.description: Open the app, and you're in the studio. Top half for the outer camera, bottom half for the inner camera. No complex settings.

notification.title: Fun at 0:10 AM
notification.description: Clips taken today are automatically compiled into one video at 0:10 AM the next day. The "Video is ready!" notification is your signal to enjoy yesterday's highlights.

mock.title: Video is ready!
mock.subtitle: Let's look back at yesterday's memories.

efficiency.title: Watchable Length
efficiency.description: Even if you shoot 30 times a day, the resulting video is only "1 minute". Watch it quickly during transit or breaks. That's the 2sec experience.

steps.title: Shoot
steps.description: Tap the top half (outer cam) or bottom half (inner cam) of the main screen. Recording starts after a 2-second countdown. It ends automatically after 2 seconds.
steps.detail: Retake or delete with one tap from the preview.

steps.title: Export
steps.description: Usually, you wait for the next day's notification, but if you want to "compile now", that's fine too. You can instantly create and save "Today's Summary Video" from the icon on the top right of the home screen.

steps.title: Past Videos
steps.description: Videos are saved in the app for 7 days. Even if you think "I forgot to save that day's video", you can select the date and export it up to 6 days ago.

download.title: Start 2sec Life.
download.description:
Turn casual daily life into irreplaceable records.
Start the simplest life-log camera now.
